i would put this in the <#C22PDRW72|data-driven-content> channel and would also  recommend posting your code

lol right? ugh #Learning
yup.

Is anyone experiencing a bug with their custom modules where the HubSpot editor will fail to add the options to a Rich Text Module (e.g. no styling, source code, etc, the whole top part) or will not respond when you click the editing interface? Like clicking “Apply” or “Edit Call-To-Action” and you can see it clicking but it does nothing? In addition, I’m seeing the slide out function fails to size properly and is either cutting off a portion of the custom modules fields or just freezing completely. I’ve seen this happening on-and-off then it fixes itself. We’re seeing a lot of instability right now in any browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari). I feel like I’m going crazy trying to figure out what is our code and what is HubSpot having issues. Anyone else?

I haven’t personally seen this but a client reported this morning an issue that sounds possibly related.

She had text in a rich text field she was editing and all of a sudden it stopped letting her type more text into the field.

It seemed like a javascript error on the editor side.

Client was using Firefox.

I was unable to reproduce the issue in Chrome, did not try in firefox
fix is in the works

Hey everyone.  Was there a change to how HubSpot forms are outputted recently?

I have one form that’s outputting in a `<span class="hs_cos_wrapper hs_cos_wrapper_widget hs_cos_wrapper_type_form">` and another outputting in `<div class="hbspt-form">`
:+1:  thanks Nate!

Yes, I have identical custom modules where the content editor in one works fine, but the other one will not load the rich text options or allow updates. It’s mind-bending. They’re identical and we’ve of course accounted for using {{name}} etc, to avoid duplicate stuff. Never had this issue with them in the past either. It’s not a new page.
All my styling for forms had been based around `.hbst-form` and it’s now broken
Uh oh
oh, it gets even better.  The old HTML gets loaded and then on window.load, everything gets replaced with new HTML
<https://www.libertystaffing.ca/apply-online-now-0?hs_preview=hwMjAlQK-9750283306>

the fields aren’t even in a form tag anymore
I know!!!

of course, always is
I’d contact HS support via chat/call hopefully that should get HS peeps on it faster
Just got off the phone with them.  It’s being escalated
still weird as heck
yikes

it’s something like content.widgets.widgetname.field.body.value
